name: Global uniques
uniques: [+75]% growth [in all cities] <when between [1] and [10] Happiness>
[-75]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-10] and [-1] Happiness>
Nullifies Growth [in all cities] <when below [-10] Happiness>
Rebel units may spawn <when below [-5] Happiness>
Militaristic City-States grant units [2] times as fast when you are at war with a common nation
